00074   void
00075   revert()
00076   {
00077     if(A_original_vertices){
00078       size_t arr_len = 3*A_num_verts;
00079       std::copy(A_original_vertices, A_original_vertices + arr_len, A_vertices);
00080       std::copy(A_original_normals, A_original_normals + arr_len, A_normals);
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00086 
00091   inline virtual void
00092   get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Quaternion *Q, my_float_t *T) const
00093   {
00094     if(A_original_vertices)
00095       lse_3D_fit(A_original_vertices, A_vertices, A_num_verts, Q, T);
00096     else{
00097       my_float_t q[] = {1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00098       *Q = Quaternion(q, 4);
00099       std::fill(T, T+3, 0.0);
00100     }
00101   }

00103   virtual bool
00104   closest_point(const my_float_t *pt, my_float_t *dist, my_float_t *cp,

00106   {
00107     std::cerr << "Unimplemented function: SimpleTrimeshTwo::closest_point\n"
00108               << "Please use ImmovableMesh::closest_point instead\n";
00109     return false;
00110   }

00166   const my_float_t
00167   get_total_SA() const
00168   {
00169     my_float_t rv = 0;
00170     for(face_vci face = A_triangles.begin(); face < A_triangles.end(); ++face)
00171       rv += face->area; 
00172     return rv;
00173   }

00195   virtual void
00196   update_triangle_data_structure(const uint tri_idx, const uint *vert_idz,
00197                                  const my_float_t **vertices,
00198                                  const my_float_t **normals)
00199   {
00200     triangle_t tmp;
00201     std::copy(vertices, vertices + 3, tmp.vertices);
00202     std::copy(normals, normals + 3, tmp.normals);
00203     A_triangles.push_back(tmp);  
00204   }

00211   inline bool
00212   update_closest_pt(my_float_t *best_d, my_float_t *closest_pt,
00213                     const my_float_t d, const my_float_t *cp) const
00214   {
00215 #if 0
00216     my_float_t abs_d = (d < 0.0 ? -1.0 * d : d);
00217     my_float_t abs_saved_d = (*best_d < 0.0 ? -1.0 * (*best_d) : (*best_d));
00218 #endif
00219     my_float_t abs_d = d;
00220     if(abs_d < 0.0) abs_d *= -1.0;
00221     my_float_t abs_saved_d = *best_d ;
00222     if(abs_saved_d < 0.0) abs_saved_d *= -1.0;
00223     if(abs_d < abs_saved_d){
00224       *best_d = d;
00225       std::copy(cp, cp + 3, closest_pt);
00226       return true;
00227     }
00228     return false;
00229   }
